did.head: Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Stanford University. Study of Undergraduate Education.

did.unittitle: Stanford University, Study of Undergraduate Education, records
did.abstract: Collection includes working papers of the Study consisting of notes, minutes, memoranda, correspondence, statements, reports, and questionnaires, 1954-1956, and the published report by Robert Hoopes and Hubert Marshall, 1957. Also included is the report of the Stanford Survey of the Behavioral Sciences, 1954.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Stanford University, Study of Undergraduate Education, Records (SC0425). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: The Stanford Study of Undergraduate Education, organized in August of 1954, addressed issues of teaching, students' intellectual motivation, and the curriculum in order to improve undergraduate education at Stanford.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Collection includes working papers of the Study consisting of notes, minutes, memoranda, correspondence, statements, reports, and questionnaires, 1954-1956, and the published report by Robert Hoopes and Hubert Marshall, 1957. Also included is the report of the Stanford Survey of the Behavioral Sciences, 1954.
